Class Captcha

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.hogent.pietervaneeckhout.bachelorthesis.captchabuilder.Captcha
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Captcha
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Captcha.java (UTF-8) Captcha object, contains the image, the answer, buildstring used to create the image and the date the captcha was create. 2013/04/17

    1.0.7
